title: Temporary Maintenance - April 11th
author: MIR4
contents:
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40990380/6c6773252dda5311be2415f9f8116f10596c315f.png[/img]

[h2]From my battle to our war, MMORPG MIR4[/h2]

Greetings, Dragonians!

We will be conducting Temporary Maintenance to proceed with an infrastructure check to provide a stable service along with the fix on the known issues.

Please kindly understand that Temporary Maintenance will be proceeded unavoidably for better gaming environment.

You are not able to access the game during the Temporary Maintenance. 

Remember to disconnect from the game at a safe place before the start of maintenance.

[b]■ Scheduled Fixes[/b]
- Infrastructure Maintenance
- Issue Fix on Enhancement content

[b]■ Maintenance Schedule[/b]
ASIA(UTC+8): Tuesday, Apr. 11, 2023, (UTC+8) 6:00 am ~ 10:00 am
INMENA(UTC+6): Tuesday, Apr. 11, 2023, (UTC+6) 4:00 am ~ 8:00 am
EU(UTC+2): Tuesday, Apr. 11, 2023, (UTC+2) 12:00 am ~ 4:00 am
SA(UTC-3): Monday, Apr. 10, 2023, (UTC-3) 7:00 pm ~ 11:00 pm
NA(UTC-4): Monday, Apr. 10, 2023, (UTC-4) 6:00 pm ~ 10:00 pm

[b]■ Maintenance Target [/b]
- ASIA / INMENA / EU / SA / NA

※ Portal / Raids will be restricted from 30 minutes before the maintenance. 
※ Maintenance schedule may change depending on the circumstances without prior notice.
※ You can't access the game during maintenance. 
※ We will open the servers in order. 

We will do our best to provide stable service. 

Thank you.
